Articles.Content:
Hi gang,

Just noticed, after coming down to the mun for the first time in 0.25, that the textures have been updated/changed, I no longer see the pebbles/rocks, and kinda miss that, is it a setting that I've not turned on or just that those enhancements haven't yet been added back to the game?

And... my poor kerbal, glad they seem to live forever, I had to bail him out as my mun lander ran out of fuel 1500 above the surface (had intended it to be a one way trip as a beginning base, etc) and he's all by himself now - no ship hehehe.
Turn on the terrain scatter in settings, it's off by default.
Check your surface scattering slider in the graphic pannel of the option menu. Turn it to the max and I can guarantee you'll see plenty of rocks.

Will do, figured I mist have missed something there...

Ok turned on, then quit and restarted it ...

Ahh, thank you guys!
